channel.title: Abnib Birthdays
channel.description: Birthdays and other special events of Abnibbers, their partners, and their children

item.title: Martin's 7th birthday is in 7 days
item.description: It's on Wednesday 15 January 2025. On WhatsApp? Send greetings via Claire or Jimmy.
item.abnib:longdesc: Martin's 7th birthday is on Wednesday 15 January 2025.

item.title: Lorcán's birthday is in 7 days

item.abnib:longdesc: Lorcán's birthday is on Monday 20 January 2025.
